verbose_text: In the tomato immune receptor-Pti1b RLCK module [XREF_BIBR], a phosphatase termed pattern triggered immunity inhibiting PP2C 1 (Pic1) negatively controls Pti1b autophosphorylation and activity, which relays flagellin induced immune signaling [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: immune receptor-Pti1b RLCK module [ XREF_BIBR ], a phosphatase termed pattern-triggered
